# cook your code here
for t in range(int(raw_input().strip())):
    s = raw_input().strip()
    b = [0]*26
    c = [0]*26
    if True:
        for x in range(97,123):
            if s.count(chr(x)):
                b[x-97] = s.count(chr(x))
        for x in range(65,91):
            if s.count(chr(x)):
                c[x-65] = s.count(chr(x))
        si = 0
        for x in range(26):
            si = si + b[x]//2 + b[x]%2 + c[x]//2 + c[x]%2
        print si
